<page title>: Canon Digital IXUS 500 - PowerShot and IXUS digital compact cameras - Canon Europe
af lock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way
batteries: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery NB-1LH (battery and charger supplied)
battery life:
Approx. 190 shots (LCD monitor on)
Approx. 440 shots (LCD monitor off)
Approx. 140 min. (Playback)
continuous shooting:
High Speed at approx. 2.2 fps¹ (speed maintained for up to 14 images)
Normal at approx. 1.5 fps¹ (speed maintained for up to 17 images)²
display formats: Single/ Index (9 thumbnail images)/ Slide Show/ Magnified/ Movie
menu categories:
(1) Recording Menu
(2) Playback menu
(3) Set-up menu
(4) My camera menu
(5) Function menu
menu languages: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
modes: Auto, Manual, Long Shutter, Macro, Infinity, Stitch Assist, Movie
my camera: Start-up image and camera sounds customisation
photo effects: Vivid, Neutral, Low Sharpening, Sepia, Black & White
still image type: JPEG (Exif 2.2 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
